ygData.subject: Re: [eqbards] Bards and Pulling (and a few other comments)
ygData.msgSnippet: ... there s quite a few dragons there that see thru invis heh. and there s no way for the casters to nail you down unless you let them.
ygData.messageBody:
At 09:33 AM 2/27/01 -0500, you wrote:
>Get your fill of pulling while you can! Once you get clarity, the casters
>will nail you down tight! You get to stand around and sing clarity while the
>rangers, rogues, etc have all the fun. I haven't pulled in ages. I finally
>got to pull a dragon in Western Wastes last weekend. I was so happy! The
>first attempt saw the ranger eatten very quickly. He said it was keeping up
>with him on SOW, so I got elected to fetch. BTW, I am fairly sure one of the
>named dragons there sees through invis. Rak Something or other swatted me
>out of the sky like a fly while I was looking for a corpse.

there's quite a few dragons there that see thru invis heh.

and there's no way for the casters to nail you down unless you let them.
